long_description: Made with just a handful of whole organic ingredients, Skout Organic Trailbars are a delicious source of nourishment to get you through a day of adventure. Trailbars are kosher, vegan, gluten-free and certified USDA organic; each bar contains a full serving of fruit. Bar does not contain dairy, soy or any added sugar or fillers. Skout Organic Trailbars are made in the Willamette Valley of Oregon. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Made with just a handful of whole organic ingredients, Skout Organic Trailbars are a delicious source of nourishment to get you through a day of adventure.
